headline: Microchip Tech (MCHP) Sheds 6.7% as Chip Giant Signals Soft Outlook
summary: We recently published Wall Street’s 10 Worst Performing Stocks. Microchip Technology Incorporated (NASDAQ:MCHP) is one of the worst performers on Wednesday. Microchip Technology declined by 6.66 percent on Wednesday to close at $70.25 apiece after a semiconductor giant signaled weaker demand and a cautious outlook for the industry.
